definition: person from the same village, town or province/peasant (derog.)/(of a school of thought etc) follower

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: And yet outsiders could still help Somalis to help themselves.
sentences.chinese: 然而外界还是可以帮助索马里人实现自救。

sentences.english: I' ll drink his health in honour of its being Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，城里人喝酒时都举杯祝她健康。

sentences.english: The vine growers killed the sheep of the dwellers in the hills .
sentences.chinese: 种葡萄的人杀死了山里人的羊。

sentences.english: Although she's lived there for ten years, the villagers still treat her as an outsider.
sentences.chinese: 她虽然在那儿住了十年，村里人仍视她如外人。

sentences.english: If you're feeling down or upset, let your friends and family members support you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感觉沮丧难过，让你的朋友和家里人支持你。

sentences.english: no little anecdotes to share with the folks?
sentences.chinese: 就没些个奇闻异事要跟家里人分享的？

sentences.english: Our son have to go to school, we must fight for our family's honor.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿子一定得上学，一定要替家里人争口气。

sentences.english: 'Clean the environment, beautify our surroundings', why did the urban tourists ignore it?
sentences.chinese: “净化环境，美化家园”，难道城里人也不懂吗？

sentences.english: Then she rushed home to tell the news to the family.
sentences.chinese: 然后她急冲冲赶回家，把消息告诉了家里人。

sentences.english: But Ziyun hadn't come back, which worried the family very much.
sentences.chinese: 可是紫云一直没回来，家里人着急不已。

sentences.english: Family advised him to first two children back to the summer country, pressure Yajing.
sentences.chinese: 家里人劝他先把两个孩子送回国度暑假，压压惊。

sentences.english: The villagers said that her mother is "crazy wife."
sentences.chinese: 村里人都说妈妈是“疯老婆”。

sentences.english: Reem said members of her family first ordered her to submit, then expected her to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 里姆说家里人先开始命令她屈服，然后期望她庆祝。

sentences.english: In 2006, the grown-up Lan Jinfeng decided to build a road.
sentences.chinese: 年，成长后的蓝锦锋决定带着村里人修路。

sentences.english: The man likes sulk, and very unwilling to explain the angry reason to family members.
sentences.chinese: 男人喜欢闷气，而且特别不愿向家里人讲生气的原因。

sentences.english: He had not become a trim self-satisfied city man .
sentences.chinese: 他没有变成一个衣冠楚楚，神气十足的城里人。

definition: a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
native place/place of origin/home state or region
